Title: Funke Akindele’s ‘Behind The Scenes’ hits ₦1.1bn in 19 days
Summary: Nollywood Film Behind The Scenes has crossed the ₦1.1 billion mark at the box office . The new milestone was announced on Monday via social media posts by the film’s lead star and producer .

Title: Two Britons dead as Anthony Joshua survives motor accident in Ogun
Summary: Anthony Joshua survived a fatal car accident in Ogun State, Nigeria, which claimed the lives of two British men travelling with him . The crash occurred on Monday along the busy Lagos–Ibadan Expressway near Sagamu, when Joshua was travelling .

Title: CSOs query Tinubu’s silence on U.S. airstrike in Sokoto
Summary: A coalition of civil society organisations (CSOs) expressed concern over what it described as the silence of Nigeria’s political and military leadership following an alleged U.S. airstrike on Nigerian territory on Christmas Day . In a joint statement issued issued, the CSOs questioned Tinubu's silence .

Title: Anthony Joshua: FRSC blames ‘excessive speed’, ‘wrongful overtaking’ for accident
Summary: Joshua was involved in an accident near Sagamu, Ogun State on Monday . The Federal Road Safety Corps blames ‘excessive speed’ and ‘wrongful overtaking’ for the accident .

Title: Fubara not APC leader in Rivers, says Wike
Summary: Minister of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Nyesom Wike, has dismissed claims that Rivers State Governor, Siminalayi Fubara, has automatically become the leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the state . Wike has dismissed the claim that Rivers Governor has automatically taken over as the leader

Title: Abia Govt to revive Aba textile Mills to create more opportunities
Summary: Abia Govt to revive Aba textile Mills and other moribund key industries . Governor Alex Otti disclosed this at Ngwa High School, Aba, during the 2025 Ngwa Day . He said he is prioritising job creation and security in the state .

Title: Aiyedatiwa signs N524bn 2026 budget into law
Summary: Ondo State Governor, Lucky Aiyedatiwa, has signed the 2026 Appropriation Bill, tagged the ‘Budget of Economic Consolidation,’ into law . The 2026 budget is the 'Budget of Economic consumulation'

Title: Soludo signs 2026 budget, 3 other Bills into law
Summary: Anambra State Governor, Professor Chukwuma Soludo, has signed four Bills, including the 2026 Appropriation Bill into law . The Bills were recently passed by the State House of Assembly .

Title: Adeleke signs 2026 Appropriation Bill into law
Summary: Governor Ademola Adeleke on Monday signed the 2026 appropriation bill into law . The bill marks a key step in the state’s budgetary and governance process . The 2026 Appropriation Bill was passed by the Osun State House of Assembly .

Title: Anthony Joshua, driver in hospital; dead foreign nationals in mortuary  —  Ogun govt
Summary: The fatal crash occurred on Monday along the Lagos–Ibadan Expressway, within the Makun axis of Ogun State, and claimed the lives of two male foreign nationals .

Title: 2026 budget: Gombe allocates N12bn to northern security
Summary: Governor Muhammadu Yahaya signed the N617.95 billion 2026 Appropriation Bill into law at the Council Chamber of the Government House, Gombe, on Monday . Yahaya said the 2026 budget prioritises critical sectors, including health, education, social investment, environmental protection and mineral resources development, while also making special provision

Title: Life is bigger than boxing, Jake Paul prays for Anthony Joshua
Summary: American YouTuber-turned-boxer, Jake Paul, has expressed sympathy and concern following a road accident involving British heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua in Ogun State, Nigeria . In a post shared on X (formerly Twitter) on Monday, Paul wrote, “I am praying for the lost lives, AJ, and anyone impacted by

Title: Debris from US strikes hits Kwara hotel, injures staff – Owner
Summary: The surprise US raid on Christmas Day targeted militants linked to the Islamic State group, according to sources in Abuja and Washington . The federal government had acknowledged that debris from the munitions fell in various locations, including “in Offa, Kwara State, near the premises of a hotel,” but stated that there were no civilian

Title: Gombe gov signs N617.95bn 2026 budget into law
Summary: The 2026 budget allocates N189 billion for recurrent expenditure, representing 21.6 per cent of the total . N428.5 billion, or 69.4 per cent, is devoted to capital projects, reinforcing the administration’s focus on infrastructure, service delivery, and long-term growth . A notable feature of the budget

Title: N200m ransom stalls release of abducted ex-customs officer - Family
Summary: Emmanuel Owolabi, a retired Customs officer, was abducted near his home in Ora, Osun State, on December 15 . He was seized in front of their home along Akisa Road shortly before 7pm .
